overview:
Lindsay Ronga is the CEO of Cork’d, a site for winelovers to review, share and discuss wine in a fun, interactive way.

Prior to Corkâ€™d, Lindsay worked in Boston as an Associate for Spectrum Equity, a $4 billion private equity fund, covering the online media and software sector. She also spent two years in Citigroupâ€™s Technology Investment Banking Group in Palo Alto, CA working on a number of transactions ranging from mergers and acquisitions to equity offerings. In her endeavor to learn more about the wine industry, Lindsay worked for Empire Merchants (Charmer Sunbelt), a large beverage distributor, as a financial analyst. Lindsay received a B.S. in Finance with Distinction from the University of Colorado and an MBA from Harvard Business School.
